TestCase.name: DII_ConO_001
TestCase.description: Check display the Confirmation Overlay for sending to Email

step.description: Prerequisite: 1. DII Results Summary page is opened Select some individual checkboxes on Results Summary
step.substep: Clicking Link 'Selected database link'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Link 'DII'. Expected result: True.
General Search page was opened
Button 'Clear Field' is enabled
Click 'Clear Field' button
Clicking Button 'Clear Field'. Expected result: True.
Button 'Search' displayed during 0 seconds
Check clear sreen
Clicking Button 'Select years dropDown'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Button 'Select all years from dropdown'. Expected result: True.
Enter search field - search field = Title, search term = oil
Clicking Button 'Search'. Expected result: True.
Checking/unchecking CheckBox 'checkbox for record #1'. Expected result: True.
Checking/unchecking CheckBox 'checkbox for record #2'. Expected result: True.

step.description: Click on Email icon at the top or at the bottom of page
step.substep: Clicking Button ''Export' button'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Button 'E-mail the selected records'. Expected result: True.
E-mail output options page was opened

step.description: Enter valid email address in "Email To" field and hit on "Send Email" button
step.expected: Processing Overlay is displayed Please note: Options Overlay no longer is displayed
Confirmation Overlay is displayed after finish of emailing process. Please Note: Processing Overlay no longer is displayed

step.description: Check "Records Emailed" heading is displayed at the top of Overlay in orange color and bold-face
step.expected: "Records Emailed " heading is displayed at the top of Overlay in orange color and bold-face

Confirmation Text is displayed bellow Heading and separated by grey horizontal line in the following formats: N records emailed to : email address, where N- count of outputted records NOTE: "N records emailed to :" text is displayed NOT in boldface "1 record emailed to:" is displayed if one record was selected on Step 1.

step.description: Check that email address entered on Step2 is displayed in bold face
step.expected: The email address entered on Step2 is displayed in bold face
step.substep: Text: 'newthomsontesting@gmail.com' was sent to the 'Email Records To' textbox (TSHFactory.Selenium.Locators), textbox content after sending is 'newthomsontesting@gmail.com'
Text of Text 'Title' contains all requested texts.
Clicking Button 'Send E-mail'. Expected result: True.
Text of Text 'Title' contains all requested texts.

substep.tech_info:
Locators:
XPath("Locator is never used!!!")
Searching time (seconds): 5.0124507

step.substep: 2 Can't find Text ''

substep.tech_info:
Clickers that were requested to click: 'Jquery, SeleniumClick'.
Clickers that was send actions methods to element: SeleniumClick. Clicking time (seconds): 5.7839597

step.substep: Clicking exception: 2 Can't find Text ''

step.description: Check that Confirmation Overlay is disappeared after 1,5 seconds
step.expected: Confirmation Overlay is disappeared after 1,5 seconds
step.substep: Container 'Email Records Pop up' is not displayed. It wasn't found.
Disposing current IWebDriver
Dispose was successfully done
Disposing current IWebDriver
Dispose was successfully done

TestCase.name: KJD_ConO_002
TestCase.description: Check display the Confirmation Overlay for sending to my.endnote.com

step.description: Prerequisite: 1. KJD Results Summary page is opened 2. User is Signed In. Click on arrow in "Send To" drop-box
step.substep: Clicking Link 'Sign In'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Link 'Sign In'. Expected result: True.
Sign In Window was opened
Text box 'Email' is enabled
Text: 'quality.tester@testcases.com' was sent to the 'Email' textbox (XPath("//input[@id='email']")), textbox content after sending is 'quality.tester@testcases.com'
Text box 'Password' is enabled
Textbox: 'XPath("//input[@id='password']")' was cleared
Text: '!12345654321a' was sent to the 'Password' textbox (XPath("//input[@id='password']")), textbox content after sending is '!12345654321a'
Clicking Button 'SignIn'. Expected result: True.
General Search page was opened
Clicking Link 'Selected database link'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Link 'KCI - KJD'. Expected result: True.
General Search page was opened
Click 'Clear All Fields' button
Clicking Button 'Clear All Fields'. Expected result: True.
Button 'Search' displayed during 0 seconds
Check clear sreen
Clicking Button 'Select years dropDown'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Button 'Select all years from dropdown'. Expected result: True.
Enter search field - search field = Title, search term = Bending Reality: Adventures in Global Plastic Surgery
Clicking Button 'Search'. Expected result: True.

step.description: Click on linked text in drop-box menu
step.substep: Clicking Button ''Export' button'. Expected result: True.
Clicking Button 'my.endnote.com'. Expected result: True.
Send To MyEndNote.com Window Window was opened

step.expected: Processing Overlay is displayed Please note: Options Overlay no longer is displayed
Confirmation Overlay is displayed after finish of sending process. Please Note: Processing Overlay no longer is displayed

step.description: Check "Records Sent To my.endnote.com" heading is displayed at the top of Overlay in orange color and bold-face
step.expected: "Records Sent To my.endnote.com" heading is displayed at the top of Overlay in orange color and bold-face

Confirmation Text is displayed bellow Heading and separated by grey horizontal line in the following formats:N records sent to my.endnote.com, where N- count of outputted records NOTE: "N records sent to my.endnote.com" text is displayed NOT in boldface"1 record sent to my.endnote.com" is displayed if one record was sending to my.endnote.com.

step.description: Check that Confirmation Overlay is disappeared after 1,5 seconds
step.expected: Confirmation Overlay is disappeared after 1,5 seconds
step.substep: Dropdown: 'Full Record' options were requested to be selected in 'Drop down 'Record content'' dropdown (TSHFactory.Selenium.Locators), selected option in dropdown after selection is 'Full Record'
Dropdown: 'Full Record' option was requested to be selected in 'Drop down 'Record content'' dropdown (TSHFactory.Selenium.Locators), selected option in dropdown after selection is 'Full Record'
Textbox: 'XPath("//span[contains(text(), 'Export Records to EndNote Online')]/../..//input[@id='markFrom']")' was cleared
Textbox: 'XPath("//span[contains(text(), 'Export Records to EndNote Online')]/../..//input[@id='markTo']")' was cleared
Text: '1' was sent to the 'Records from' textbox (XPath("//span[contains(text(), 'Export Records to EndNote Online')]/../..//input[@id='markFrom']")), textbox content after sending is '1'
Text: '1' was sent to the 'Records to' textbox (XPath("//span[contains(text(), 'Export Records to EndNote Online')]/../..//input[@id='markTo']")), textbox content after sending is '1'
Text of Text 'Title' contains all requested texts.
Clicking Button 'Send'. Expected result: True.
Text of Text 'Title' contains all requested texts.
